00031 // ANY NEW ACTIONS ADDED - UPDATE OVERHEAD.C ARRAY WITH ACTION'S STRING VALUE
00032 #define FIRST_MOVEMENT_ACTION AI_ACTION_RANDOM_PATROL
00033 #define LAST_MOVEMENT_ACTION AI_ACTION_MOVE_TO_CLIMB
00034 typedef enum
00035 {
00036       AI_ACTION_NONE = 0,                                   // maintain current position & facing
00037 
00038       // actions that involve a move to another tile
00039       AI_ACTION_RANDOM_PATROL,                  // move towards a random destination
00040       AI_ACTION_SEEK_FRIEND,                    // move towards friend in trouble
00041       AI_ACTION_SEEK_OPPONENT,                  // move towards a reported opponent
00042       AI_ACTION_TAKE_COVER,                           // run for nearest cover from threat
00043       AI_ACTION_GET_CLOSER,                           // move closer to a strategic location
00044 
00045       AI_ACTION_POINT_PATROL,                   // move towards next patrol point
00046       AI_ACTION_LEAVE_WATER_GAS,          // seek nearest spot of ungassed land
00047       AI_ACTION_SEEK_NOISE,                           // seek most important noise heard
00048       AI_ACTION_ESCORTED_MOVE,                  // go where told to by escortPlayer
00049       AI_ACTION_RUN_AWAY,                                   // run away from nearby opponent(s)
00050 
00051       AI_ACTION_KNIFE_MOVE,                           // preparing to stab an opponent
00052       AI_ACTION_APPROACH_MERC,                  // move up to a merc in order to talk with them; RT
00053       AI_ACTION_TRACK,                                      // track a scent
00054       AI_ACTION_EAT,                                              // monster eats corpse
00055       AI_ACTION_PICKUP_ITEM,                    // grab things lying on the ground
00056 
00057       AI_ACTION_SCHEDULE_MOVE,                  // move according to schedule
00058       AI_ACTION_WALK,                                             // walk somewhere (NPC stuff etc)
00059       AI_ACTION_RUN,                                              // run somewhere (NPC stuff etc)
00060       AI_ACTION_WITHDRAW,     // back off
00061       AI_ACTION_FLANK_LEFT,   // move to the left
00062       AI_ACTION_FLANK_RIGHT,  // move to the right
00063       AI_ACTION_MOVE_TO_CLIMB,                  // move to edge of roof/building
00064       // miscellaneous movement actions
00065       AI_ACTION_CHANGE_FACING,                  // turn to face a different direction
00066 
00067       AI_ACTION_CHANGE_STANCE,                  // stand, crouch, or go prone
00068       // actions related to items and attacks
00069       AI_ACTION_YELLOW_ALERT,                   // tell friends opponent(s) heard
00070       AI_ACTION_RED_ALERT,                            // tell friends opponent(s) seen
00071       AI_ACTION_CREATURE_CALL,                  // creature communication
00072       AI_ACTION_PULL_TRIGGER,                   // go off to activate a panic trigger
00073 
00074       AI_ACTION_USE_DETONATOR,                  // grab detonator and set off bomb(s)
00075       AI_ACTION_FIRE_GUN,                                   // shoot at nearby opponent
00076       AI_ACTION_TOSS_PROJECTILE,          // throw grenade at/near opponent(s)
00077       AI_ACTION_KNIFE_STAB,                           // during the actual knifing attack
00078       AI_ACTION_THROW_KNIFE,                    // throw a knife
00079 
00080       AI_ACTION_GIVE_AID,                                   // help injured/dying friend
00081       AI_ACTION_WAIT,                                             // RT: don't do anything for a certain length of time
00082       AI_ACTION_PENDING_ACTION,                 // RT: wait for pending action (pickup, door open, etc) to finish
00083       AI_ACTION_DROP_ITEM,                            // duh
00084       AI_ACTION_COWER,                                      // for civilians:  cower in fear and stay there!
00085 
00086       AI_ACTION_STOP_COWERING,                  // stop cowering
00087       AI_ACTION_OPEN_OR_CLOSE_DOOR, // schedule-provoked; open or close door
00088       AI_ACTION_UNLOCK_DOOR,                    // schedule-provoked; unlock door (don't open)
00089       AI_ACTION_LOCK_DOOR,                            // schedule-provoked; lock door (close if necessary)
00090       AI_ACTION_LOWER_GUN,                            // lower gun prior to throwing knife
00091 
00092       AI_ACTION_ABSOLUTELY_NONE,          // like "none" but can't be converted to a wait by realtime
00093       AI_ACTION_CLIMB_ROOF,                           // climb up or down roof
00094       AI_ACTION_END_TURN,                                   // end turn (after final stance change)
00095       AI_ACTION_END_COWER_AND_MOVE, // sort of dummy value, special for civilians who are to go somewhere at end of battle
00096       AI_ACTION_TRAVERSE_DOWN,                  // move down a level
00097       AI_ACTION_OFFER_SURRENDER,          // offer surrender to the player
00098       AI_ACTION_RAISE_GUN,
00099 } ActionType;
